header.para: The XtraRichEdit Suite enables you to create applications with rich text editing functionality. You simply drop the control onto a form and immediately have access to a text editor with an intuitive user interface. To ensure superior performance, the editor uses a multithreaded formatting. This technique provides significant improvement in application response times which makes your solution even more appealing for the end-user.
